start.pokedex: I am the Pokedex and i will be your tool in your adventure.
start.how_to_use:
How to use me? This is my commands:
/start - show the welcome message
/help - show the commands available
/settings - show the configuration
/pokemon + name or ID - The pokemon to see. Example: /pokemon pikachu

Try to use /help to see all commands

settings.lang:
Change the language.

The language actual is

language.en: You are using now english language
language.es: El español será el idioma por defecto
